contentrichtext.text: {{Non-free use rationale |Article=Municipal Borough of Bromley |Description=logo (historic coat of arms) |Source=[http://www.civicheraldry.co.uk/kent_ob.html#bromley%20bc Details of the arms] |Portion=entire logo |Low_resolution=yes |Purpose=Used to represent the organization in an article on that organization. |Replaceability=no |other_information=This rationale '''only''' covers use in the article on this organization represented by this logo. Any other use requires a different, separate rationale. }} Arms of [[Bromley]] Borough Council. From [http://www.civicheraldry.co.uk civicheraldry.co.uk], with permission.
